## Rectangle.distanceSquared() method

Computes the squared distance between the centers of two rectangles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
distanceSquared(other: Rectangle): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

other


</td><td>

[Rectangle](./alfa-rectangle.rectangle.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

## Remarks

The squared distance is used to avoid the expensive square root operation. If the actual distance is needed, the square root of the squared distance can be taken.
